name: Scrum Day
content: Get ready for Scrum Day USA, featuring thoughtful discussions and short, interactive training on the Scrum framework. There is no better, more affordable opportunity to learn from Scrum experts and colleagues. Whether you're a Product Owner, Developer, Scrum Master, or leader supporting a Scrum Team, attending Scrum Day will give you the insights and practical tools you need to level up your practice. Booking: https://go.evvnt.com/1579908-2?pid=4868 Price: General Admission: USD 495.00 Time: 07:30 to 16:30 Venue details: Alliant Energy Center, 1919 Alliant Energy Center Way, Madison, Wisconsin, 53713, United States
